#summary Examples of calling the jQuery fillerup plugin
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

=Add some HTML=

Add a single piece of content:

{{{
$('#col2').fillerup({
  alignWith:'#col1',
  content:'<p>Stuff to add</p>'
});
}}}

=Add an array of HTML=

Add an array of content:

{{{
$('#col2').fillerup({
  alignWith:'#col1',
  content:['<p>Stuff to add</p>','<div><img src="myimg.jpg"/>More stuff</div>']
});
}}}

=Call a function=

Call a function to add content:

{{{
function addMoreContent(o) {
  $(this).append('<p>Stuff to add</p>');
}

$('#col2').fillerup({
  alignWith:'#col1',
  content:addMoreContent
});
}}}

=Call a function that uses AJAX=

Call a function that uses to add content:

{{{
function addMoreContent(o) {
  var e = $(this);
  e.load('myurl.php', function(){ e.fillerup(o); });

  // Important - when using ajax, return false to stop fillerup
  // from immediately calling this function again.

  return false;
}

$('#col2').fillerup({
  alignWith:'#col1',
  content:addMoreContent
});
}}}
